title: Designing Strategies to Enhance Accessibility in Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in corporate education operations
context.additional_context: Accessibility Improvement Practicum Using VR Simulations in Smartphone-Centric Constrained Environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize online content accessibility evaluation tools compliant with WCAG 2.1 standards.
Learners can design educational materials reflecting various disability types (visual, auditory, motor) in simulated environments.
Learners can diagnose accessibility barriers in mobile-based educational environments and propose improvement strategies.

resources: Summary of Accessibility Guidelines for People with Disabilities
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
